title: MBallSectionsDR
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: How Studying The Greatest Speeches In American History Can Change You (And Your Children) Forever
items.description: We simply started with the words. For the foundation of all learning, all communication, and all thought, is words.

items.title: Never Stop Loving America
items.description: It’s a mess, but a blessed one.

items.title: Is Nikole Hannah-Jones’s 1619 Project Grift Drying Up?
items.description: The gigs that funded Hannah-Jones' lavish lifestyle seem to be fewer in number and flatlining as Americans see through the Critical Race Theory scam.

items.title: A Brief Guide To Using ‘Recissions’ And ‘Pocket Recissions’ To Cut Federal Spending
items.description: The Trump rescissions package should provide an opportunity to begin to reduce the continued, disastrous growth of the federal budget.

items.title: Predatory Pricing Is More Myth Than Market Threat
items.description: Basic economic ideas explain why most alleged cases of predatory pricing represent something else entirely.

items.title: America Loses If Russia Wins
items.description: If America relinquishes its leadership of the free world, our economy, our security, and our future will be in peril.

items.title: In Attempt To Insult Top Women’s Sports Defender, Simone Biles Confirms Difference In The Sexes
items.description: Biles’ public ‘female-only sport for me but not for thee’ approach to the issue is not only hypocritical, but incredibly unpopular.

items.title: How Republicans Can Make the Tax Bill More Pro-Growth
items.description: They should insist on making full expensing for capital investment permanent for all businesses.

items.title: ABC correspondent suspended after bashing Trump, Miller as 'world-class' haters
items.description: ABC News correspondent Terry Moran has been suspended after attacking top Trump aide Stephen Miller as "richly endowed with the capacity for hatred."

items.title: Mike Johnson downplays Musk's influence and says Republicans will pass Trump's tax and budget bill
items.description: With an uncharacteristic feistiness, Speaker Mike Johnson took clear sides Sunday in President Donald Trump's breakup with mega-billionaire Elon Musk.

items.title: Pete Buttigieg Doesn’t Have a Time Machine
items.description: It means little that he can half-heartedly break from aspects of the Democratic Party’s record that he now realizes are controversial.
